actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry

official_title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Great Lakes basin initiative for agricultural nonpoint source pollution prevention.
short_title: Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013

summary.text: Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to require the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA), in consultation with the Great Lakes States, to establish a Great Lakes basin initiative for agricultural non-point source pollution prevention. Gives funding priority to producers that participate in a state verification program. Defines "Great Lakes State" as Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Minnesota, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, or Wisconsin.

titles.title: Great Lakes Assurance Program Verification Act of 2013
To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a Great Lakes basin initiative for agricultural nonpoint source pollution prevention.
